indicator_name: Proporción del gasto de las administraciones públicas autonómicas que se dedica a salud
objetivo_global: 1- End poverty in all its forms everywhere
meta_global: 1.a Ensure significant mobilization of resources from a variety of sources, including through enhanced development cooperation, in order to provide adequate and predictable means for developing countries, in particular least developed countries, to implement programmes and policies to end poverty in all its dimensions
definicion: Proportion of the expenditure of the autonomous public administration that is dedicated to health (functional group 07 of the Classifications of the  Functions of Government (COFOG), used internationally to classify the purposes of government activities)
formula:
$$PG_{health}^{t} = \frac{G_{health}^{t}}{G^{t}} \cdot 100$$

where:

$G_{salud}^{t} =$ expenditure of the autonomous public administration dedicated to health (functional group 07 of the Classifications of the Functions of Government (COFOG) in year $t$

$G^{t} =$  total expenditure of the autonomous public administration in year $t$
observaciones:
The Classifications of the Functions of Government (COFOG), developed by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development 
(OECD) and published by the United Nations Statistics Division, structures public spending into 10 functional groups: 

- 01 General public services
- 02 Defense
- 03 Public order and security
- 04 Economic affairs
- 05 Environmental protection
- 06 Housing and community services
- 07 Health
- 08 Leisure, culture and religion
- 09 Education
- 10 Social protection
texto_oceca: Indicador calculado utilizando una metodología armonizada entre los órganos centrales de estadística de las comunidades autónomas.

eu.objetivo_global: 1- End poverty in all its forms everywhere
eu.meta_global: 1.a Ensure significant mobilization of resources from a variety of sources, including through enhanced development cooperation, in order to provide adequate and predictable means for developing countries, in particular least developed countries, to implement programmes and policies to end poverty in all its dimensions
eu.definicion: Osasunera bideratutako herri-administrazio autonomikoen gastuaren proportzioa (07 talde funtzionala, Herri-Administrazioen Funtzioen Sailkapenean (COFOG),  nazioartean gobernuaren jardueren helburuak sailkatzeko erabiltzen dena)
eu.formula:
$$PG_{osasuna}^{t} = \frac{G_{osasuna}^{t}}{G^{t}} \cdot 100$$

non:

$G_{osasuna}^{t} =$ osasunera bideratutako herri-administrazio autonomikoen gastua  
(07 talde funtzionala Herri-Administrazioen Funtzioen Sailkapenean (COFOG) $t$ urtean

$G^{t} =$ herri-administrazio autonomikoen guztizko gastua $t$ urtean
eu.observaciones:
Herri-Administrazioen Funtzioen Sailkapenak (COFOG), Ekonomia Lankidetza eta Garapenerako Erakundeak (ELGA) 
garatu eta Nazio Batuen Estatistika Atalak argitaratutakoak, gastu publikoa 10 talde funtzionaletan 
egituratzen du:

- 01 Zerbitzu publiko orokorrak
- 02 Defentsa
- 03 Ordena publikoa eta segurtasuna
- 04 Gai ekonomikoak
- 05 Ingurumena babestea
- 06 Etxebizitza eta zerbitzu komunitarioak
- 07 Osasuna
- 08 Aisia, kultura eta erlijioa
- 09 Hezkuntza
- 10 Gizarte-babesa
eu.texto_oceca: Indicador calculado utilizando una metodología armonizada entre los órganos centrales de estadística de las comunidades autónomas.
